text.div:
Invasive Pneumococcal Disease (Tests for Streptococcus pneumoniae Antigen)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org

    17652-9 Streptococcus pneumoniae Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Latex agglutination

    31969-9 Streptococcus pneumoniae Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
